title: Dover: spring 1947
creator_credit: Data Film Productions, Papua New Guinea. Office of Information and Mary Beales
brief_description: A study of the rebuilding program of the English Channel town of Dover, which suffered heavy damage from shellfire during WWII. The historic town is to be, very largely, rebuilt on a new site, and extensive use is to be made of recently developed prefabrication techniques. Good use of British humour gives this doco additional interest.
